message.body: So when are we gonna hang
Wellll I have an essay due at 11:59 on Tuesday night that I haven't started lol so what about Wednesday?
I can't wednesday I have a final thursday , but I'm free thursday after my final and a meeting I have to attend , thursday night? Or if anything friday ?
Hmm ok let's try for Thursday night. Friday will be our backup
Sounds good :) btw you know I go to school 10 blocks from you right?

Haha yeah that's awesome! So we can hang around the area and get some food and maybe hang out at my house. Btw I just remembered I have something with my mom on Thursday night so we will have to do Friday if that's okay
